text: Wayne Froman was an American actor who worked extensively in Australia, in particularly on radio. He also appeared on stage and in the film South West Pacific. He had worked as a comedian in New York when he arrived in Australia in late 1939 to appear in Ziegfeld Follies. In July 1945 he, along with a number of other actors, was banned for three months from radio for broadcasting "objectionable matter". ==References== ==External links== *Select Australian theatre credits at AusStage Category:American male radio actors Category:20th-century American male actors Category:American male musical theatre actors Category:Place of birth missing Category:Year of birth missing
title: Wayne Froman
